name: DME Civil Blueprint Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to construct civilian Dassault-Mikoyan ship hulls, weapons, and fighter LPCs.

name: DME Core Blueprint Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to construct the common Dassault-Mikoyan ship hulls, weapons, and fighter LPCs.

name: DME Advanced Blueprint Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to construct advanced Dassault-Mikoyan ship hulls, weapons, and fighter LPCs.

name: DME Missile Blueprint Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to construct a range of Dassault-Mikoyan missile weapons.

name: DME Ballistic Blueprint Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to construct a range of Dassault-Mikoyan ballistic weapons.

name: DME Energy Blueprint Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to construct a range of Dassault-Mikoyan energy weapons.

name: Sixth Bureau Blueprint Package
desc: Tremendously rare blueprints for the Sixth Bureau fine-tunings of several Dassault-Mikoyan hulls.

name: Sigma Tech Package
desc: Rare production blueprints for a few items of Sigma-matter derived weaponry.

name: Deserter Blueprint Package
desc: Extremely rare blueprints for prototype Blade Breaker hulls and weapons.

name: Bladewood Project Blueprints
desc: Blueprints for an advanced prototype mothership and supporting weaponry.

name: DME Refit Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to construct modified and obsolete Dassault-Mikoyan ship hulls, weapons, and fighter LPCs.

name: Magellan Core Blueprint Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to construct the common Magellan ship hulls, weapons, and fighter LPCs.

name: Magellan Advanced Blueprint Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to construct advanced Magellan ship hulls, weapons, and fighter LPCs.

name: Leveller Blueprint Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to construct Leveller-refit ship hulls, weapons, and fighter LPCs.

name: Skytiger Blueprint Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to construct specialist hulls and fighter LPCs for the Skytiger Guards.

name: Herd Blueprint Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to construct raider hulls and fighter LPCs for the Herd.
